postlist.title: How to make braised pork trotters
postlist.excerpt: Braised pork trotters are a beloved dish in many Asian cuisines. It’s a rich, flavorful, and comforting dish that’s perfect for cold days or for any occasion. In this recipe, we’ll go through the steps of making a simple and delicious braised pork trotters dish.
